short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No js code, only let your chrome running in background

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On Windows OS, You may want to run Chrome in background for quick restart, but if there is no extension have background permission, Chrome will quit totally if last tab is closed. 

This extension does only one thing that makes Chrome running in the background. And the chrome icon with be seened in the windows system tray. 

ATTENTION: works only on Windows OS.
